name: Brand Style Guide
description:
What is a brand style guide?

A brand style guide takes your companyâ€™s mission, vision, values and translates them into a set of design rules. It tells how to use and communicate Your brand to the public.


Benefits of a brand style guide:

  1. Establishes brand identity
  2. Communicates core values to the public
  3. Defines rules for internal team and partners
  4. Ensures a continuous brand experience


Pages Included:

  • Title Page
  • Components
  • Mission Statement
  • Logo
  • Colors
  • Typography
  • Iconography
  • Text Fields
  • Selectors
  • Buttons
  • Cards
